targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo as metric, 
  open_issues_count as value 
FROM daily_metrics 
WHERE repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging') 
ORDER BY date ASC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo as metric, 
  open_issues_count as value 
FROM daily_metrics 
WHERE repo IN (${repo:singlequote}) 
ORDER BY date ASC

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo as metric, 
  stars as value 
FROM daily_metrics 
WHERE repo IN (${repo:singlequote}) 
ORDER BY date ASC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo as metric, 
  stars as value

ORDER BY date ASC

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', d.date) as INTEGER) as time,
  d.repo as metric,
  (
    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.author)
    FROM pull_requests p
    WHERE p.repo = d.repo
      AND p.created_at > date(d.date, '-7 days')
      AND p.created_at <= date(d.date, '+1 day')
      AND json_extract(p.data, '$.author_association') NOT IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR')
  ) as value
FROM daily_metrics d
WHERE d.repo IN (${repo:singlequote})
ORDER BY d.date ASC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', d.date) as INTEGER) as time,
  d.repo as metric,
  (
    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.author)
    FROM pull_requests p
    WHERE p.repo = d.repo
      AND p.created_at > date(d.date, '-7 days')
      AND p.created_at <= date(d.date, '+1 day')
      AND json_extract(p.data, '$.author_association') NOT IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR')
  ) as value
FROM daily_metrics d
WHERE d.repo IN (${repo:singlequote})
ORDER BY d.date ASC

targets.queryText:
-- Internal Rejection
SELECT CAST(strftime('%s', date(closed_at)) as INTEGER) as time, repo || ' (Internal)' as metric, count(*) as value 
FROM pull_requests 
WHERE state = 'closed' AND merged_at IS NULL AND repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging') 
  AND json_extract(data, '$.author_association') IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR') 
GROUP BY 1, 2

UNION ALL

-- External Rejection
SELECT CAST(strftime('%s', date(closed_at)) as INTEGER) as time, repo || ' (External)' as metric, count(*) as value 
FROM pull_requests 
WHERE state = 'closed' AND merged_at IS NULL AND repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging') 
  AND json_extract(data, '$.author_association') NOT IN ('OWNER', 'MEMBER', 'COLLABORATOR') 
GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY 1 ASC

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo || ' (Internal)' as metric, 
  AVG(time_to_merge_internal) OVER (PARTITION BY repo ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 30 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value 
FROM daily_metrics 
WHERE repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging') AND time_to_merge_internal > 0 

UNION ALL 

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo || ' (External)' as metric, 
  AVG(time_to_merge_external) OVER (PARTITION BY repo ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 30 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value 
FROM daily_metrics 
WHERE repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging') AND time_to_merge_external > 0 
ORDER BY time ASC
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo || ' (Internal)' as metric, 
  AVG(time_to_merge_internal) OVER (PARTITION BY repo ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 30 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value 
FROM daily_metrics 
WHERE repo IN (${repo:singlequote}) AND time_to_merge_internal > 0 

UNION ALL 

SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo || ' (External)' as metric, 
  AVG(time_to_merge_external) OVER (PARTITION BY repo ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 30 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value 
FROM daily_metrics 
WHERE repo IN (${repo:singlequote}) AND time_to_merge_external > 0 
ORDER BY time ASC

targets.queryText:
-- Time to First Response
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo || ' (First Response)' as metric, 
  AVG(time_to_first_response) OVER (PARTITION BY repo ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 30 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value 
FROM daily_metrics WHERE repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging') AND time_to_first_response > 0

UNION ALL

-- Time to Close External Issues
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo || ' (Resolution Time)' as metric, 
  AVG(time_to_close_issue_external) OVER (PARTITION BY repo ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 30 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value 
FROM daily_metrics WHERE repo IN ('agent-builder','agent-sop','docs','evals','mcp-server','private-docs-staging','private-sdk-python-staging','private-sdk-typescript-staging','private-tools-staging','samples','sdk-python','sdk-typescript','strands-action','strandsagents.com','tools','.github','private-samples-staging','private-strands-action-staging') AND time_to_close_issue_external > 0
ORDER BY time ASC
targets.rawQueryText:
-- Time to First Response
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo || ' (First Response)' as metric, 
  AVG(time_to_first_response) OVER (PARTITION BY repo ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 30 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value 
FROM daily_metrics WHERE repo IN (${repo:singlequote}) AND time_to_first_response > 0

UNION ALL

-- Time to Close External Issues
SELECT 
  CAST(strftime('%s', date) as INTEGER) as time, 
  repo || ' (Resolution Time)' as metric, 
  AVG(time_to_close_issue_external) OVER (PARTITION BY repo ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 30 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value 
FROM daily_metrics WHERE repo IN (${repo:singlequote}) AND time_to_close_issue_external > 0
ORDER BY time ASC
